contentList.content: Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 26. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects for 10 turns.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 22. This elixir can be thrown at a target to apply its effects for 10 turns.
<LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increased by 2.
<LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increased by 6.
The wearer gains +1 to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">melee attack rolls</LSTag> while surrounded by [1] or more foes.

Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to its spell Attack Rolls and spell Difficulty Class for each remaining turn.

Reduce the duration by [2] each time the entity takes damage. Maximum duration is [3] turns.
Whenever you deal damage with a weapon attack, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> for 2 turns.
Scroll of Battle Resurrection
Godswill
Restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charge.
The Reviving Hands: Revivify
When you <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revive</LSTag> a creature it gains the effect of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATH_WARD">Death Ward</LSTag>.
Improved Blade Ward
Protect an ally: it will take only half the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks.

When you heal a creature, you make a DC [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Religion Check</LSTag>, success granting it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Bless</LSTag> for 2 turns. If the target is already <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">blessed</LSTag> the effect duration will be increased by 2 turns.
You gain permanent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESISTANCE">Resistance</LSTag>.
Throw a bomb that explodes on impact, pushing the target back [1].
You can regain [1] or gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on attack roll or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> as a reaction.
Once per turn, when you hit the enemy with unarmed attack, you receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DT_MAG_SOUL_CATCHING">Grasp Essence</LSTag> for 2 turns.
If you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> using this blade, you have a chance of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> your target.
